languages.text: Когда отступничество Вольного Торговца от законов Империума стало очевидно, Флот последовал долгу и дал династии фон Валанциус бой. Сражение при Даргонусе закончилось тяжелым поражением, и уцелевшие корабли бежали в удаленные системы. Там, раненые, но не сломленные, они собирали силы и планировали рейды во впавшие в отступничество системы.

When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.
languages.original_text: Когда отступничество Вольного Торговца от законов Империума стало очевидно, Флот последовал долгу и дал династии фон Валанциус бой. Сражение при Даргонусе закончилось тяжелым поражением, и уцелевшие корабли бежали в удаленные системы. Там, раненые, но не сломленные, они собирали силы и планировали рейды во впавшие в отступничество системы.

traits.locale_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Fleet honoured its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

languages.text: 当行商浪人的背叛行为暴露之后，帝国海军履行了职责，与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝开战。然而，达戈努斯之战最终以惨败告终，幸存的舰船逃到了遥远的星系。帝国海军全体军官都感到灰心丧气，但并没有一蹶不振。他们发誓要重建海军舰队，对叛徒的领土再度展开攻击。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人的背叛行为暴露之后，帝国海军履行了职责，与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝开战。然而，达戈努斯之战最终以惨败告终，幸存的舰船逃到了遥远的星系。帝国海军全体军官都感到灰心丧气，但并没有一蹶不振。他们发誓要重建海军舰队，对叛徒的领土再度展开攻击。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の背教が判明した時、帝国海軍は職務を全うしてフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と戦った。ダルゴナスの戦いでは大敗を喫し、生き残った船は遠く離れた星系へと逃げた。失望してはいたものの負傷はしていない中隊長たちは軍を立て直すことと誓い、背教者の領域への急襲を計画した。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の背教が判明した時、帝国海軍は職務を全うしてフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と戦った。ダルゴナスの戦いでは大敗を喫し、生き残った船は遠く離れた星系へと逃げた。失望してはいたものの負傷はしていない中隊長たちは軍を立て直すことと誓い、背教者の領域への急襲を計画した。

languages.text: Lorsque l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} devint évidente, la Marine Impériale accomplit son devoir en combattant la dynastie von Valancius. La bataille de Dargonus se solda par une défaite retentissante, et les vaisseaux rescapés fuirent vers des systèmes lointains. Démoralisés mais pas brisés, les capitaines jurèrent de rebâtir leurs armées et organisèrent des raids dans le territoire apostat.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} devint évidente, la Marine Impériale accomplit son devoir en combattant la dynastie von Valancius. La bataille de Dargonus se solda par une défaite retentissante, et les vaisseaux rescapés fuirent vers des systèmes lointains. Démoralisés mais pas brisés, les capitaines jurèrent de rebâtir leurs armées et organisèrent des raids dans le territoire apostat.

languages.text: Cuando la apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente era innegable, la Armada Imperial cumplió con su deber y se enfrentó a la dinastía von Valancius. La Batalla de Dargonus acabó con una sonora derrota, y las naves supervivientes huyeron a sistemas lejanos. Descorazonados, pero no rotos, los capitanes juraron reagrupar sus fuerzas y planearon asaltos al territorio de{mf|l| la} apóstata.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente era innegable, la Armada Imperial cumplió con su deber y se enfrentó a la dinastía von Valancius. La Batalla de Dargonus acabó con una sonora derrota, y las naves supervivientes huyeron a sistemas lejanos. Descorazonados, pero no rotos, los capitanes juraron reagrupar sus fuerzas y planearon asaltos al territorio de{mf|l| la} apóstata.

languages.text: Als die Apostasie {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} offensichtlich wurde, erfüllte die Imperiale Kriegsflotte ihre Pflicht und bekämpfte die Dynastie von Valancius. Die Schlacht von Dargonus endete mit einer umfassenden Niederlage, und die verbliebenen Schiffe flohen in entfernte Systeme. Entmutigt, aber nicht gebrochen, schworen die Captains, ihre Streitmacht wieder aufzubauen, und planten Angriffe im Apostatengebiet.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: Als die Apostasie {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} offensichtlich wurde, erfüllte die Imperiale Kriegsflotte ihre Pflicht und bekämpfte die Dynastie von Valancius. Die Schlacht von Dargonus endete mit einer umfassenden Niederlage, und die verbliebenen Schiffe flohen in entfernte Systeme. Entmutigt, aber nicht gebrochen, schworen die Captains, ihre Streitmacht wieder aufzubauen, und planten Angriffe im Apostatengebiet.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in dinsizliği âşikar hâle geldikten sonra İmparatorluk Donanması, görevini yerine getirerek von Valancius hanedanlığıyla savaştı. Dargonus Muharebesi net bir mağlubiyetle sonuçlandı. Kalan gemiler, ücra sistemlere çekildi. Cesareti kırılmış ama hâlâ mücadeleyi sürdürmek isteyen kaptanlar, kuvvetlerini yeniden kurmaya yemin edip dinsizin diyarına yapacakları baskınları planlamaya başladı.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's apostasy became apparent, the Imperial Navy fulfilled its duty and fought the von Valancius dynasty. The Battle of Dargonus ended in resounding defeat, and the surviving ships fled to distant systems. Disheartened but not broken, the captains vowed to rebuild their force and planned raids into the apostate territory.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in dinsizliği âşikar hâle geldikten sonra İmparatorluk Donanması, görevini yerine getirerek von Valancius hanedanlığıyla savaştı. Dargonus Muharebesi net bir mağlubiyetle sonuçlandı ve geriye kalan gemiler ücra sistemlere çekildi. Cesareti kırılmış ama tamamen yok olmamış kaptanlar, kuvvetlerini yeniden kurmaya yemin ettiler ve dinsizin diyarına yapacakları baskınları planlamaya başladılar.
